title: COMBOLITE
description:
COMBOLITE combines roguelike deckbuilders and autobattlers in a unique way. You start every round by acquiring more weapons for your deck. Each weapon has unique stats, some inflict status effects, which you can use to create synergies between weapons Use gems and buffs to boost the damage of your weapons!
Your weapons attack in a set order, one at a time. This game is all about creating the optimal sequence of weapons, finding cool combinations and synergies in an attempt to deal as much damage as possible iDigging
HIT THE BALL AND BREAK THE GAME! I’ve seen millions of damage done, someone hit 13 BILLION damage in a single turn! You’re encouraged to break this game, and with multiplicative buffs this isn’t hard to do!
But you have to be quick! The target damage keeps increasing every turn, and if you can’t deal enough damage, then you’ll be thrown back to the main menu !
EXPLOIT the buffs you get! These buffs make a certain category of weapons stronger, or provide an overall buff to the player, like increased shop luck. You get these after every third fight, buying loot bags in the shop, opening treasure chests and by completing objectives!
